startDate._instruction: Enter the start date of this affiliation.
startDate.description: Date in the Gregorian calendar at which something begins in time
startDate.title: startDate

endDate._instruction: Enter the end date of this affiliation. Leave blank if the affiliation is still current.
endDate.description: Date in the Gregorian calendar at which something terminates in time.
endDate.title: endDate

organization._instruction: Add organization to which a person is or was affiliated.
organization.description: Legally accountable, administrative and functional structure.
organization.title: organization
